title: Joined a game, disconnected and came back
body: I joined a game, disconnected after 3-4 minutes, then came back (we also won). I got a leaver buster at 20 minutes for  the next five games. This should be removed. Can this happen?

replies.body: Even if you win or return to the game, the [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) may mark you with a lower priority queue because everyone was still down a player.  All leaves cause negative experiences for others, so it will treat everyone the same regardless of intent.  If you are having any issues with your connection, let me know with more detail and I'm happy to help.  Let me know!
